appName.description: The name of the the extension.

up.description: Message for when shields is enabled

down.description: Message for when shields is disabled

forThisSite.description: Partial string for the phrase `shields is up *for this site*`

enabledMessage.message: Se um site aparecer quebrado, tente desativar as proteções
enabledMessage.description: Message telling the user to disable shields if a site appears broken

disabledMessage.message: Você está navegando neste site sem nenhuma proteção de privacidade e segurança.
disabledMessage.description: Message telling the user that shields are disabled

itemsBlocked.description: Message for the main blocked resources text when there is more than one ad/track/script blocked (plural)

itemBlocked.description: Message for the main blocked resources text when there is one ad/track/script blocked (singular)

and.description: Message for the `and` conjunction. Used to connect grammatically the `item blocked and connection upgrades` and its variant phrases

connectionsUpgraded.description: Message for the main blocked resources text when there is at least one ad/track/script blocked and more than one connection upgrade (plural)

connectionUpgraded.description: Message for the main blocked resources text when there is at least one ad/track/script blocked and one connection upgrade (singular)

thirdPartyTrackersBlocked.description: Message for the scripts blocked row label

connectionsUpgradedHTTPS.message: Upgrade das conexões para HTTPS realizado
connectionsUpgradedHTTPS.description: Message for the connections upgraded row label and for the main blocked resources text when there is more than one connection upgraded (plural) and no other ads/trackers blocked

connectionUpgradedHTTPS.message: Upgrade da conexão para HTTPS realizado
connectionUpgradedHTTPS.description: Message for the main blocked resources text when there is one connection upgraded (singular) and no other ads/trackers blocked

scriptsBlocked.description: Message for the scripts blocked row label

thirdPartyCookiesBlocked.description: Message for the option in the cookies select field to block all 3rd party cookies

allCookiesBlocked.description: Message for the option in the cookies select field to block all cookies

allCookiesAllowed.description: Message for the option in the cookies select field to allow all cookies

thirdPartyFingerprintingBlocked.description: Message for the option in the device recognition select field to block all 3rd party recognition attempts

allFingerprintingBlocked.message: Tentativa de reconhecimento de dispositivo bloqueada
allFingerprintingBlocked.description: Message for the option in the device recognition select field to block all device recognition attempts

allFingerprintingAllowed.message: Todas as tentativas de reconhecimento de dispositivo permitidas
allFingerprintingAllowed.description: Message for the option in the device recognition select field to allow all device recognition attempts

deviceRecognitionAttempts.description: Message for the device recognition attempts blocked panel

scriptsOnThisSite.description: Message for the script resources blocked panel

blockedScripts.description: Message for the script resources blocked

allowedScripts.description: Message for the script resources allowed

blockAll.description: Message for the resources blocked *block all* option

allowAll.description: Message for the resources blocked *allow all* option

block.description: Message for the resources blocked *block* option

allow.description: Message for the resources blocked *allow* option

blockedOnce.description: Message for the resources blocked *blocked once* option

allowedOnce.description: Message for the resources blocked *allowed once* option

allowScriptsOnce.description: Message for the shortcut in the main interface to allow all scripts once

cancel.description: Message for the button inside the static list of resources blocked to cancel the operation

goBack.description: Message for the button inside the static list of resources blocked to go back from the current screen

applyOnce.description: Message for action in dynamic list of resources blocked to *apply once*

changeDefaults.description: Message for the button action linking to the settings page

addBlockElement.description: Message for context menu that adds a filter for the cosmetic filtering

resetSiteFilterSettings.message: Limpar regras de CSS para este site
resetSiteFilterSettings.description: Message for context menu that resets the site filters for cosmetic filtering

resetAllFilterSettings.message: Limpar regras de CSS para todos os sites
resetAllFilterSettings.description: Message for context menu that resets all cosmetic filters
